item.title: Setting up VMs
item.description: In this chapter, we will import Ubuntu 24.04 OVA appliance to VirtualBox and will set it up. Download Ubuntu OVA file cd ~/Downloads/ curl -LO https://cloud-images.ubuntu.com/noble/current/noble-server-cloudimg-amd64.ova Create a seed iso which is needed for setting initial password and login Generate new SSH keys of not already done ssh-keygen Install cloud-utils sudo apt install cloud-utils Create config to set at intial-boot cat <<EOF > my-cloud-config.yaml #cloud-config chpasswd: list: | ubuntu:ubuntu expire: False ssh_pwauth: True ssh_authorized_keys: $(cat ${HOME}/ssh/id_rsa.
